Text: Didn`t any of you want Hardtied any more i will stop upload from that site  :-)  There are a couple hundred download the last one i up but no thanx so i just wonder  ..........

Merzedes, it's hit or miss with PD and his various sites.  Some of his models, like Calico, I really like.  Many of the others, not so much.  You are a busy man, so I can't pretend to tell you what is the best use of your time?  Perhaps you can leave it up to requests only?  Do you keep a blog or something where you can be contacted?  I try to reseed requests on your pages that I have, but don't always keep up.  Thanks for the continued hard work.  Cheerz!

"Xenorex"  Thanx that was a good ide to let it be a ,requests only. I will try that.Maybe i will do that with Infernal Restraint too. I will upload the nexst one and see wath`s responds i got :-)   Cheerz
I never download any Hardtied stuff.  Mostly just the stuff from Kink, for which I am eternally grateful!  Thanks, merzedes!

I love PDs work, and I always get your IR or Hardtied uploads, thanks for all your time. 

U are a legend, merzedes!

M... I will take what ever you can get.  This is great what you do... Thanks again.

Any Society SM stuff will be appreciated!
Thanks for all the uploads, particularly all the PD stuff from Insex, Hardied and Infernal Restraints
